QuestData.Title: Making Repairs
QuestData.Description: Twenty shredders by noon tomorrow!$b$bWho makes these schedules, anyway? No one who ever put one of these garbage cans back together, that's who....$b$bIf I'm going to hit my quota, I'll need a hand. Help me out and I'll share my commission with you - fair enough?$b$bI need cogs, sprockets and springs. They're littered across the ground down by the shredders.
QuestData.LogDescription: Lurz at Blue Sky Logging Grounds wants you to collect 4 Grooved Cogs, 3 Notched Sprockets, and 2 High Tension Springs.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ya fetch those parts for me yet?
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks, $N. That should keep me going - at least until tomorrow....$B$BHere's the cash I promised.
